title: Don
short_cast: Sivakarthikeyan, S. J. Suryah, Samuthirakani, Priyanka Arul Mohan, Soori, Munishkanth, Kaali Venkat, Bala Saravanan, Sivaangi Krishnakumar, Gautham Vasudev Menon
cast: Sivakarthikeyan, S. J. Suryah, Samuthirakani, Priyanka Arul Mohan, Soori, Munishkanth, Kaali Venkat, Bala Saravanan, Sivaangi Krishnakumar, Gautham Vasudev Menon
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 13 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 13
desc: Seeking a sense of purpose, a wayward college student navigates life on campus while enduring a controlling father and a disciplinarian professor.
